title: afk
description: Set or remove your AFK status.
---

Set or remove your AFK status.

## Usage

```sh
;afk <reason>
;afk reset
```

## Examples

```sh
# set your afk status to 'eating'
;afk eating
# reset your afk status
;afk reset
```
